title: Why does i get into same login portal after clicking submit marks in pessat puc marks
content: i finished all the details as im from TN state board, anyways after finishing all the given things, i clicked the submit marks and it let me into the login portal again so should i have to redo it again or is it done? im not really sure so i made this post. Please help me here.

comments.body: and also is it for all students who wrote the exam or for students who got selected?
The same thing is happening w me
Google form tha na jisme marks bharne the?
Idk hindi can u say it in english?
I got an email today to upload my pessat jee 10th 12th scores. It had a link to a google form where i filled all the info.
Oh ig because i applied thru the jee main quota thats why
Are you really applying for PES with 98 percentile?
Isn't the cutoff usually 98 percentile? Lol.
Yeah everywhere i searched said 98 but lets hope i get in
Dude you need to upload in jpg format, no png, no pdf
